body_html:
TensorFlow 1.4 supports CUDA 8, cuDNN 6. Here are the configurations we support:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources#tested_source_configurations

We anticipate releasing TensorFlow 1.5 with CUDA 9 and cuDNN 7:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/RELEASE.md

Also note that this is a duplicate of #14244

body:
TensorFlow 1.4 supports CUDA 8, cuDNN 6.  Here are the configurations we support:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources#tested_source_configurations

We anticipate releasing TensorFlow 1.5 with CUDA 9 and cuDNN 7:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/RELEASE.md

Also note that this is a duplicate of #14244
